short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyPassword helps people create passwords that are easy to remember.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyPassword guides users through the process of generating a password. This extension provides help creating personalized passwords. Unlike chrome random password suggester, our product creates passwords that are more personalized and easily remembered.
